dsm.util

Class Evaluation

  • java.lang.Object
    • dsm.util.Evaluation

  • public class Evaluation
extends java.lang.Object
    The class responsible for the evaluation of the DSM on a test dataset.

      This function calculates the product of the logarithm of the frequency of the words in the question for the selected POS, for input word pairs in case of the input word pair similarity datasets.
      static void evaluate()
      This function is responsible for computing the semantic similarity of words.
      static <V,X,Y,Z> void evaluate(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>>> allQuestionsWithAllAnswersMap, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap1, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap2, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap3, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap4, java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Long> featureMap1, java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Long> featureMap2, java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Long> featureMap3, java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Long> featureMap4, java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> informationMap1, java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Double> informationMap2, java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Double> informationMap3, java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Double> informationMap4, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> wordFrequencies, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> vectorElementSums, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> vectorElementAbsValueSums, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> vectorLengthSquares, long numberOfAllFeatures, long allWordTypeCount, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>> semanticCategoryMap)
      This function computes the semantic similarity of all the word pairs of a given POS in the selected test dataset.

      • Evaluation

        public Evaluation()

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public static void evaluate()
        This function is responsible for computing the semantic similarity of words. It computes the semantic similarity of all the word pairs in the selected test dataset.

      • evaluate

        public static <V,X,Y,Z> void evaluate(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>>> allQuestionsWithAllAnswersMap,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap1,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap2,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap3,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap4,
                                      java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Long> featureMap1,
                                      java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Long> featureMap2,
                                      java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Long> featureMap3,
                                      java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Long> featureMap4,
                                      java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> informationMap1,
                                      java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Double> informationMap2,
                                      java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Double> informationMap3,
                                      java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Double> informationMap4,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> wordFrequencies,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> vectorElementSums,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> vectorElementAbsValueSums,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> vectorLengthSquares,
                                      long numberOfAllFeatures,
                                      long allWordTypeCount,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>> semanticCategoryMap)
        This function computes the semantic similarity of all the word pairs of a given POS in the selected test dataset.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap1
        X - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap2
        Y - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap3
        Z - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap4
        Parameters:
        allQuestionsWithAllAnswersMap - a map, in which the question words are stored with all the possible answers
        tuplesMap1 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        tuplesMap2 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        tuplesMap3 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        tuplesMap4 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        featureMap1 - a map, in which the features of a given type are stored together with the number of word types with which they occur
        featureMap2 - a map, in which the features of a given type are stored together with the number of word types with which they occur
        featureMap3 - a map, in which the features of a given type are stored together with the number of word types with which they occur
        featureMap4 - a map, in which the features of a given type are stored together with the number of word types with which they occur
        informationMap1 - a map, in which the information content of features of a given type are stored
        informationMap2 - a map, in which the information content of features of a given type are stored
        informationMap3 - a map, in which the information content of features of a given type are stored
        informationMap4 - a map, in which the information content of features of a given type are stored
        wordFrequencies - the map containing the frequency of words of a given POS
        vectorElementSums - a map, in which the sum of the elements in feature vectors of a given type are stored
        vectorElementAbsValueSums - a map, in which the sum of the absolute value of the elements in feature vectors of a given type are stored
        vectorLengthSquares - a map, in which the square of the length of feature vectors of a given type are stored
        numberOfAllFeatures - the number of all features of the given type
        allWordTypeCount - the number of all words with the given POS, for which a word vector in the extracted information exists
        semanticCategoryMap - the map, in which the semantic similarity of the word pairs will be stored

      • printOutResultsSynonymQuestions

        public static void printOutResultsSynonymQuestions()
        This method calculates the performance of my method on the input synonym question dataset and prints out the results.

      • printOutResultsSynonymQuestions

        public static int printOutResultsSynonymQuestions(java.lang.String word1,
                                                  java.lang.String pos,
                                                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> semanticCategoryMap,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers)
        This function evaluates my method on a question according to the selected pos and prints out the relevant information.
        Parameters:
        word1 - the question word
        pos - the pos of the question
        semanticCategoryMap - the map, which contains the semantic similarity of word pairs for the question (determined by my method)
        answers - a list, in which the possible answers are stored
        Returns:
        0 if the anser is incorrect, 1 if it is correct

      • printOutResultsWordPairSimilarities

        public static void printOutResultsWordPairSimilarities()
        This method calculates the performance of my method on the input word pair similarity dataset and prints out the results.

      • computeFrequencyLogProduct

        public static double computeFrequencyLogProduct(java.lang.String word1,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allAnswers,
                                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> frequencyMap)
        This function calculates the product of the logarithm of the frequency of the words in the question for the selected POS, in case of synonym question dataset.
        Parameters:
        word1 - the question word
        allAnswers - a list, which contains all the possible answers for the question
        frequencyMap - a map, which contains the frequencies of words of the selected POS
        Returns:
        the product of the logarithm of the frequency of the words in the question for the selected POS

      • computeFrequencyLogProduct

        public static double computeFrequencyLogProduct(java.lang.String word1,
                                                java.lang.String word2,
                                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> frequencyMap)
        This function calculates the product of the logarithm of the frequency of the words in the question for the selected POS, for input word pairs in case of the input word pair similarity datasets.
        Parameters:
        word1 - the question word
        word2 - the second word in the pair
        frequencyMap - a map, which contains the frequencies of words of the selected POS
        Returns:
        the product of the logarithm of the frequency of the words in the question for the selected POS

      • rankMapForSpearmanCorrelationFromHashMap

        public static <V> java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> rankMapForSpearmanCorrelationFromHashMap(java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> scoreMap)
        This function converts the scores stored in @param scoreMap into ranks.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param scoreMap
        Parameters:
        scoreMap - a map, which contains instances of V with scores
        Returns:
        a map, which contains the instances of V with ranks

      • pearsonCorrelationForEvaluation

        public static <V> double pearsonCorrelationForEvaluation(java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> scoreMap1,
                                                         java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> scoreMap2)
        This function computes the Pearson correlation of two maps containing instances of V with scores. First the expected values are calculated, then the standard deviations and the covariance, finally the Pearson correlation is calculated from the other values.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param scoreMap
        Parameters:
        scoreMap1 - the first map containing instances of V with scores
        scoreMap2 - the second map containing instances of V with scores
        Returns:
        the Pearson correlation of the two maps
